text: 7.27 Wkp 9.7, Lom 6.10, Hib 5.3, 9.12 Bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ned nɨb okok, kɨli ñɨn nokom nokom tap pakɨl God nop sɨbog ñɨbal. Ned tap si tap tɨmel kɨli ke gɨpal tek, tap pak God nop sɨbog ñɨl, kɨdek binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal tek, tap pak God nop sɨbog ñɨbal. Jisas pen anɨgɨl ma gup. Mɨnek nokom ne chɨnop nen mubwak ne ak dɨl, God nop ñɨl mab bak alaŋ kumak. Nɨm tep.
